properties.displayName: Stop Windows Service Via PowerShell Stop-Service
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "Stop-Service " and ((ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName in~ ("PowerShell.EXE", "pwsh.dll")) or (FolderPath endswith "\\powershell.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\pwsh.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects the stopping of a Windows service via the PowerShell Cmdlet "Stop-Servic
